name: helsinki-city-departure
description: An app that provides real-time departure information for public transport in Helsinki.

scripts.start: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && node server/index.js
scripts.deploy-prod: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && eb deploy node-linux-2-prod-env
scripts.deploy-test: cd client && npm run build && cd ../ && eb deploy node-linux-2-test-env
